game_info.title: Console.Adventure
game_info.author: Your Name Here
game_info.description: A mysterious adventure in an ancient realm

intro_text.game_description: You find yourself in a mysterious realm filled with ancient secrets and forgotten magic.
intro_text.instruction_text: Type 'help' for available commands. Type 'quit' to exit the game.

examine_chest.description: The chest looks old and weathered. Its brass fittings are tarnished with age, but it might contain something useful.

open_chest.description: You open the chest with a loud creak. Inside, nestled in faded velvet, you find a rusty key!

read_book.description: You pick up a dusty tome and carefully open it. The pages contain mysterious symbols and arcane formulas. You feel slightly wiser after reading it.

tower_view.description: From up here, you can see a vast forest to the east, snow-capped mountains to the north, and a shimmering lake to the south. The view fills you with determination and wonder!

examine_torches.description: The torches burn with an unusual blue flame. One of them looks loose and could probably be taken.

take_torch.description:
You carefully remove the loose torch from its bracket. The blue flame flickers but continues to burn steadily in your hand.

Hint: You can now 'use torch' to light up dark areas, or check your 'inventory' to see all your items!

examine_shelves.description:
The shelves are filled with books on various subjects: ancient history, forgotten magic, and mysterious creatures. As you run your hand along one section, you hear a soft click. One of the bookcases swings inward, revealing a hidden passage!

Hint: You can now type 'secret' to enter the secret chamber!

examine_crystals.description: The crystals pulse with a gentle blue light. They seem to respond to your presence, glowing brighter as you approach.

touch_crystals.description: As you touch the crystal, warm energy flows through your body, healing your wounds and restoring your spirit!

help_text: Movement: north, south, east, west, up, down
Actions: examine, open, read, look around, touch
Items: use [item name] - use an item from inventory
Stats: stats - show your character info
Try typing the actions you see listed in each location!
messages.invalid_command: I don't understand that command. Type 'help' for available commands.
messages.exit_message: Thanks for playing! See you next time!
